discussion.p: The contents of <codecvt> are underspecified, and will take a reasonable amount of work to identify and correct all of the issues. There appears to be a general feeling that this is not the best way to address unicode transcoding in the first place, and this library component should be retired to Annex D, along side <strstream>, until a suitable replacement is standardized
Proposed change: Deprecate and move the whole of clause 22.5 [locale.stdcvt] to Annex D.
